attributes.action: Deport to the country of origin law breaking immigrants together with dependants
attributes.background:
This would encourage migrants to abide with the laws of the land and their families would help to police their actions. 
Similar to the US and Australia.
This would save tax payers money by not keeping them in prison and not having to pay out benefits to their dependants

rejection.details:
Foreign national offenders are already deported under the UK Borders Act 2007. So we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You can find out more here: 
http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/CBP-8062

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
